title: Episode 01 - Walk, Talk and Learn French
description: In this video, Pierre-Benoît discusses the phrase "Quand il y en a pour un, il y en a pour deux". Language points covered include "il y a" and adjective agreements.
content:encoded: In this video, Pierre-Benoît discusses the phrase "Quand il y en a pour un, il y en a pour deux". Language points covered include "il y a" and adjective agreements.
itunes:subtitle: In this episode Pierre-Benoit discusses the phrase 'il y en a' and looks at adjective agreements.
